resources.string: Name of the current song on track
This is the Now Playing Screen. The currently playing song is shown here. Including the control buttons for the song
This is the Screen which displays the playlist in the Music App. It displays a list of songs that are added to a specific playlist
This is the Screen which displays the Recently played songs in the Music App.
This is the Payments Page where a user can purchase Music from the app. The app can use Google Pay API to accept payments from the user. Google Pay API is easy to integrate and official payments
This page displays a list of all the songs available in the device storage
